nodes.text: The Roiya Rift was a rocky labyrinth located in the Jundland Wastes on the planet Tatooine. The entrance to the Roiya Rift was marked by a semicircle of jagged rocks which gave the impression of teeth. The rocky pillars continued throughout the rift, lining a series of twisting passageways that led further into the Jundland Wastes. The area was a favored hiding place for the native Tusken Raiders.
